item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, December 18, 2024 at 8:15 PM UTC
item.description:

2. Cultural Evolution of Cooperation Among LLM Agents (146 points | 72 comments)
3. ISO 8583: The language of credit cards (63 points | 7 comments)

7. The unbearable slowness of being: Why do we live at 10 bits/s? (181 points | 224 comments)

9. Updates to H-1B (100 points | 226 comments)
10. Silver amulet is the oldest evidence of Christianity north of the Alps (214 points | 185 comments)

25. Lies, damned lies, and Impact Hero (refoorest, allcolibri) (69 points | 5 comments)
26. Show HN: Zipshare – one-step Android screen sharing for support teams (7 points | discuss)
27. US could ban TP-Link routers over hacking fears: report (117 points | 141 comments)
28. How we centralized and structured error handling in Golang (145 points | 176 comments)
29. Chip Cities Rise in Japan's Fields of Dreams (120 points | 72 comments)
30. FTC bans hidden junk fees in hotel, event ticket prices (515 points | 517 comments)
